name: Tree Of Life (itch) (Andevindo)
description:
In this game you will see trees growing up and then falling down after certain time. Your task is to collect the logs from the dead tree. The logs you got is converted to fuel.

When you move the ship(player object in the game) forward or backward it will consumes more fuel, so be wisely.

And be careful when you stay near beside a big tree, because when it falling down it can destroy your ship.

WASD to move.
